en.title: Additional Documents
en.youNeed: Please upload any additional documents that should accompany this application(s) form(s).
en.youNeed2: Examples of additional documents can be found on the application form
en.youNeed3: Please upload each document separately by using the “upload” button
en.youNeed4: You can post or email your documents to the court. Copies of certificates must be certified, which means they must be signed and dated by a professional person such as a solicitor or doctor.

cy.title: Additional Documents - (Whelsh)
cy.youNeed: Please upload any additional documents that should accompany this application(s) form(s). - (Whelsh)
cy.youNeed2: Examples of additional documents can be found on the application form - (Whelsh)
cy.youNeed3: Please upload each document separately by using the “upload” button - (Whelsh)
cy.youNeed4: You can post or email your documents to the court. Copies of certificates must be certified, which means they must be signed and dated by a professional person such as a solicitor or doctor.- (Whelsh)

en.SIZE_ERROR: File size exceeds 20Mb. Please upload a file that is less than 20Mb
en.FORMAT_ERROR: This service only accepts files in the formats - Ms Word, Ms Excel, PDF, JPG, GIF, PNG, TXT, RTF
en.TOTAL_FILES_EXCEED_ERROR: You can upload 20 files only. Please delete one of the uploaded files and retry
en.NO_FILE_UPLOAD_ERROR: Please choose a file to upload
